name: Froggo Swing 'n Grapple
description:
Froggo Swing 'n Grapple is a side-scrolling platformer game about a little frog on an adventure to find his pet rock, Jotao.



Swing 'n grapple across the stages using Froggo's powerful and sticky tongue!



Interact with different parts of the stages to progress through the levels!



Git gud and take advantage of your grappling skills!

Features:

  • Fun side-scrolling action with a twist
  • An adventure consists of 8 different stages, each introduces unique theming and stage elements.
  • Freely Swing 'n Grapple anywhere! Complete the stages in however way you see fit!
  • Optional secret areas are hidden within all the stages. Can you find them all?
  • Shoes shops allows you to buy shoes that power up your platforming ability!
